arts.ttl: Tammer Bany 'different to what West Brom have got' as he closes in on debut
arts.sum: Albion host Gary Rowett's U's on Saturday, the seventh match of Mowbray's reign, and Bany - who has caught the eye of his manager in training this week, could be afforded a place in the matchday squad - and perhaps even a cameo run-out if the match situation permits. Little-known West Bromwich Albion playmaker Tammer Bany could be in line for his first matchday involvement when the Baggies welcome Oxford United to The Hawthorns this Saturday (3pm kick off), boss Tony Mowbray has teased.
